inclusion.criterion: carotid stenosis associated with ipsilateral cerebral ischemic infarct/s on CT or MRI/DWI imaging
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: referred and accepted by the study center for CAS as per local standard referral pathways and study center routine
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He recalls that he might have had a stroke 10-15 years ago without any residual deficit.

inclusion.criterion: patient accepts follow-up scheme and consents to follow-up visits
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: surgery within the preceding 30 days or planned surgery within 30 days after CAS
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of cerebral stroke with documented/known cause other than carotid disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: any known cause for potential cerebral embolization different than carotid stenosis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has clinically symptomatic carotid stenosis and prior CVA without residual deficits. He is referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD.
